post.author: 임기순
post.content:
As per majority of the members' opinion, we will have a picnic on Sept. 26.
Date & Time: Sept. 26 (Sat.) 1:00 PM
Location: Chris Farm
Attendees: Please respond by Sept. 22 (Tues). Please diffrentiate Adult and Children for food prep.
1. 임기순 & 1 adult 2. 고상호 외 3 3. 신민용 / 와이프 / 딸 4. 김경용 5. 황인세 비번: 1
post.title: Comm1 Picnic (BBQ)
